short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to check the MASSIVE Guidelines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps to determine whether certain code guidelines have been followed.

For this purpose, the HTML code of the current page is used in order to be able to provide suggestions for improvement with regard to performance.
